title: Manasa Diamond & Gemstone Nakshi Haaram
features: Intricate Nakshi work showcasing floral motifs, openwork design for a lighter feel, central Ruby accent for regal touch, Emerald pendant drops with delicate pearl hangings, secured prong setting for gemstones, symmetrical design honoring traditional aesthetics.
colors: and Creamy White Pearls. The Hyderabadi polish gives the gold a subtle antique sheen.
occasions: or any celebration where you want to make a statement. Also suitable for upscale modern events.
description: This piece effortlessly blends traditional South Indian craftsmanship with a modern sensibility. The use of high-quality diamonds and gemstones ensures lasting beauty and brilliance. The Nakshi work reflects centuries of artistic heritage. Its lightweight design ensures comfortable wear. The traditional color palette holds cultural significance and is considered auspicious. It can be passed down as a valuable family heirloom.
